<title level="1" pfs="">[Kreekoss](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1636)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 32

**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Kreekoss](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1636)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 53</row>

**Perception** +15; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 95

**Resistances**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 6

**Weaknesses**
good 3

**Evasion** When Kreekoss rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, fly 60 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +17,
**Damage** 2d10+8 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
talon +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Eagle Dive** <actions string="Single Action" />  Kreekoss Flies up to double his fly Speed in a straight line, descending at least 10 feet, and then makes a talon Strike.

**Snatch**   Kreekoss can Fly at half Speed while he has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) in his talons, carrying that creature along with it.

</column>
name: Kreekoss

text: Kreekoss Recall Knowledge - Beast (Arcana, Nature): DC 32 Recall Knowledge - Fiend (Religion): DC 32 Unspecific Lore : DC 30 Specific Lore : DC 27 Kreekoss Source Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 53 Perception +15; low-light vision Languages Auran, Common, Sylvan; (can't speak any language) Skills Acrobatics +15, Athletics +12 Str +4 Dex +5 Con +2 Int +0 Wis +3 Cha +1 --- AC 24 Fort +11 Ref +16 Will +14 HP 95 Resistances fire 6 Weaknesses good 3 Evasion When Kreekoss rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead. --- Speed 10 feet, fly 60 feet Melee Single Action beak +17, Damage 2d10+8 piercing Melee Single Action talon +17 (Agile), Damage 2d6+8 slashing plus Grab Eagle Dive Single Action Kreekoss Flies up to double his fly Speed in a straight line, descending at least 10 feet, and then makes a talon Strike. Snatch Kreekoss can Fly at half Speed while he has a creature grabbed or restrained in his talons, carrying that creature along with it.
